## Block.toString() method

Create a human-readable text representation of this block and any children.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
toString(opt_maxLength?: number, opt_emptyToken?: string): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  opt\_maxLength | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Truncate the string to this length. |
|  opt\_emptyToken | string | <i>(Optional)</i> The placeholder string used to denote an empty field. If not specified, '?' is used. |

<b>Returns:</b>

string

Text of block.
